description:
**Fix Overview**:

If you are experiencing issues with Microsoft Copilot running in a semi-annual channel in Word and wish to disable it, you can do so through the application settings or by utilizing Group Policy settings. 

1. Open Word and go to the **File** menu.
2. Select **Options** and navigate to the **Add-ins** tab.
3. Locate any entries related to Copilot and deactivate or remove them. 

**Details**:
- If using Group Policy: Navigate to User Configuration > Administrative Templates > Microsoft Word > Disable Copilot to prevent its operation across user sessions. (LLM Synthesized)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you have administrative rights to make configuration changes in Word or through Group Policy.
